ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Faction for Humans
ygData.msgSnippet: If you don t mind a slightly (in my opinion) cheesy way to do it (cheesy, yes, but t hat did not stop me from doing it! :D) go to the 3rd gate and to the
ygData.messageBody:
If you don't mind a slightly (in my opinion) cheesy way to do it (cheesy,
yes, but t hat did not stop me from doing it! :D) go to the 3rd gate and to
the library. Go in and take a left. There is a green to'biath there who
wants, I believe fish wine. This is just one of those, "Buy 400000000 fish
wines and get the guy drunk as hell" quests. I'd also reccomend doing it
ASAP because all of the quests of this type that have existed in the past
have been removed after some time.
